title: House for sale in Colombo 7
details:
This house is located in one of the best neighborhoods in Barns place. Ideal investment opportunity and it's a superb location to live with your family.

Details :

20 ft access road
12.25 perch land
1 car parking space ( can be extended if required or can park outside )

House is a 2 storied colonial house fully renovated recently
4 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms
Balcony space

Spacious living and dining space overlooking the garden
Dry and wet kitchen

Maids room and washroom.

Well secured neighborhood.Very convenient location
